skills.name: Write the next term of a descending integer linear sequence
Continue linear sequences expressed as patterns by drawing the next pattern
Use a linear sequence expressed as a pattern to make a prediction about another term in the sequence other than the next one

explanations.A: This is the amount we subtract when we go from one term to the next. Can you use that to find the next term?

explanations.C: To get from one term to the next we subtract 4 each time. So the next term is 24 − 4 = 20.

explanations.C: A column of two squares is added on the right each time. Starting with the 3rd term and adding a column three times gives the 6th term. Notice the width is equal to the term number.
